txt.en: Quickbeam has figured out what soil is next needed for the seed.\n\nQuickbeam is ready to speak to you at Derndingle.
Quickbeam has remembered the next step
Quickbeam believes the seed needs to be covered with chunky soil in order to continue to grow. \n\nChunky soil can be found in the north-east of Fangorn.
Seed Fertilized
Fertilize Carnimírië's Seed at the Easeful Mead
Gather clumps of cold soil ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fertilize Carnimírië's Seed at the Easeful Mead
Quickbeam needs to ponder how best to support the seed's growth.\n\nReturn to Quickbeam at Derndingle to hear what he has to say.
Quickbeam has figured out what soil is next needed for the seed.\n\nQuickbeam is ready to speak to you at Derndingle.
'We have done all we can. Now, all it needs to grow is time.'
Quickbeam believes the seed needs to be covered with rocky soil in order to continue to grow. \n\nRocky soil can be found along the mountains north-east of Derndingle.

'I have planted a seed from my fallen friend Carnimírië. He used to wander the forest, checking the soil to ensure the trees had what they needed to grow. I wish to bring the soils of the forest to his seed.'

Quickbeam believes the seed needs to be covered with sandy soil in order to continue to grow. \n\nSandy soil can be found along the river in Fangorn Forest.
Quickbeam has planted a seed to his fallen friend Carnimírië at the Easeful Mead. He wishes to honour the memory of his friend.
